profile:
Our 3-step process is designed to help whether you're ready to throw your hands in the air and hand over your entire project to our team, or you're looking for help just with paint colours or layout.

Our studio is located in Southwestern Ontario and we serve homeowners who are remodelling, redecorating, or building across Canada.

==========

STEP 1:  BOOK A DISCOVERY CALL
(EVERYONE STARTS HERE)

Usually what we do is start with a 45-minute Project Discovery Call.  During this call we will discuss your goals for your project, challenges you've been experiencing, why you're seeking help, and the overall scope of your interior decorating or design project.  This will allow us to determine whether we are the right fit to take on your project and allow us to provide an estimate.

If your project feels like a fit for both of us, we can walk you through what it looks like to work together.  We'll explain our process and packages for creating your dream home and help you select the service that best suits your needs and budget.

If it doesn't feel like a fit, we can likely refer you to someone who can better suit your needs.  Either way, you'll come away from the call with a clear knowledge of the design process and overall estimated costs your project will entail.

Visit www.comfortabledwelling.com/services to book your Discovery Call.  Once you've booked a time you'll be taken to our Getting Started Questionnaire so that you can fill us in on the details of your project and we can make the most of our time together during our call. 

Investment:  $0 (free)

========

STEP 2:  THE COMFORTABLE DWELLING CONSULTATION
(THIS IS ALWAYS AFTER THE DISCOVERY CALL)

Once we've completed the free Discovery Call, we usually begin with the Comfortable Dwelling Consultation.  This is a 2-hour meeting at your home or commercial project space where we can walk the space and dive into really getting to know your style.  We'll discuss some initial ideas and potential solutions and leave you with a comprehensive Consultation Report.

The process of developing a home or commercial interior is very personal and we will spend a lot of time together throughout your project so this step allows us to dip our toe in before fully committing.  You get to ensure you like us, our ideas, and feel confident that our team will pull together an amazing space before signing on for the entire project.

Best case, it'll be the beginning of a strong partnership.
Worst case, you'll receive ideas and knowledge you might have never thought of to move your project forward.
It's a win-win!

Investment:  $300 + HST

========

STEP 3:  SELECT THE DESIGN SERVICE THAT SUITS YOU BEST

Not all projects are created equally which is why we offer a number of packages to fit your needs.  Whether you're looking for Luxury Decor Services or you're a DIY Warrior, you have choice in how you work with us!

. . . . . . .

FULL SERVICE LUXURY INTERIORS PACKAGE:
Let us design and manage your project to completion.  We will handle every last detail and give you your own "HGTV" experience!

Clients who choose our Full Service Luxury Interiors Package will benefit from our exclusive 5-step Interiors Process that will take your space from uninspiring to impressive.

The Full Service Luxury Interiors Package is right for you if:
> You're not interested in managing your design process and prefer to hand it over to professionals.
> The idea of hiring someone who has worked with and can bring on trusted trades is appealing to you.
> You'd like to lean on the advice of a team of professionals to guide you through the process from start to finish and avoid costly mistakes.
> You want a high-quality and functional home that's beautiful enough to show off, yet comfortable enough to actually live in.

. . . . . . .

DIY LUXURY INTERIORS PACKAGE
Our DIY Luxury Interiors Package is for those who want a magazine-worthy space designed down to the last detail, but who want to execute the furniture purchasing, installation, project management, and styling on their own.

The DIY Luxury Interiors Package is right for you if:
> You want a magazine-worthy designer look for your home or commercial space.
> You make design decisions quickly and are open to new ideas that will push you past your normal comfort zone.
> You've got the time and eye to execute a detailed design plan if we tell you what to buy, where to go, and how to do it.
> You are overwhelmed by all of the ideas on your Pinterest board and worried about it not coming together right so feel you need help from a trusted professional.

. . . . . . .

DIY BASIC INTERIORS PACKAGE
Our DIY Basic Interiors Package is for those who want help with the design and details but who have the time to shop and source furnishings on their own and want to manage the project in it's entirety.

This package gives you a recipe to pull together a gorgeous and functional space on your own.

The DIY Basic Interiors Package is right for you if:
> You don't want to question what the best layout, colours, or overall design details are.  You want it done for you so that you can focus on shopping and getting it done.
> You're not great at making decisions and prefer someone to tell you what to do.
> You want to lean on a professional who has an eye for design to make sure you get it right the first time and avoid costly mistakes.
> You have time to shop and source furnishings and decor on your own.  You also have time to manage installations, estimates, construction, trades, and logistics.

. . . . . . .

DESIGNER FOR A DAY
Not every project fits into a neat little package which is why we created the Designer For A Day package.

This is our most flexible package that can be used for anything you wish!

Here are some ideas on how your Designer For A Day time:
> You're building a home and want to use the time choosing finishes like cabinetry colours, flooring, or tile.
> You want Heather to come shopping with you to pick her brain on what constitutes quality furnishings and the proper scale for your home so that you avoid costly errors.
> You've recently moved and want help deciding what to keep and what to get rid of.
> You're about to tackle a design project and would like some advice.
> You are considering purchasing a home and would like an Interior Professional's input before making that decision.

. . . . . . .

COLOUR CONSULTATION
Get your paint colours right and it will set the tone for exactly the look and feel you want.

Get them wrong, and no matter what you do to the space it'll always look off.

The Colour Consultation is right for you if:
> You are building or remodelling and want to get your paint colour correct the first time
> You want a cohesive colour story for your home that flows from one area to the next.

. . . . . . .

LAYOUT CONSULTATION
The biggest question we receive on a daily basis is "how do I lay out this tricky room"?

The layout of a space defines the flow, function, and feeling of the room making layout one of the most important design decisions!

The Layout Consultation is right for you if:
> You are stuck on how to lay out your current furniture in your space and need some help to get it right.
> You are purchasing new furniture and want some guidance around what pieces and sizing you should buy so that you avoid costly errors.
